title: Need one roomate for a 3bd 2 bathroom
posting_body: Looking for a roomate for a 3bd 2 bathroom apartment in the valley village/ north Hollywood area!
10 mins from studio city, 15 from sherman oaks.
Move in September 1st, so right away!
Room is 147 sq ft and the rent is 750$ not including utilities
We share 2 parking spots in our garage but theres a problem finding parking in the neighborhood behind us.
2nd roomate, T mobile manager, also a gamer and musician
Weve been friends for about 4 years now so like to think our home is very welcoming and we enjoy some board game nights on the weekend with a couple beers but nothing too crazy 🙂
Message me as i need to fill this room fast!
